meanings.definition: A member of a group of robbers and assassins in India.
meanings.sent1: The thuggees were feared for their crimes.
meanings.sent2: The police arrested a group of thuggees last night.
meanings.sent3: The thuggees planned a robbery but got lost on the way.
meanings.sent4: The thuggees' hideout was as secretive as a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The thuggees' leader was as cunning as a fox.

meanings.definition: The practice of robbing and murdering travelers in India.
meanings.sent1: Travelers were cautious to avoid thuggees on their journey.
meanings.sent2: The authorities worked hard to eradicate thuggees from the region.
meanings.sent3: The thuggees' robbery attempt was foiled by a sudden rainstorm.
meanings.sent4: The thuggees' crimes spread fear like wildfire among the villagers.
meanings.sent5: The legend of the thuggees' exploits grew with each passing year.
